topics.title: Use social media applications also for the distribution of sensitive content

subTitle: Integrate an additional security context into existing applications

listing.text: Extending the range of functionality provided by social media applications to include privacy features - relevance of this approach.

subTitle: Private content is supplied to the user's field of vision without being noticed by the platform operator. The procedure is similar to the reverse of ad-blocking technologies - instead of removing advertising campaigns from a website before viewing, private content is embedded on the user's side.

note: The procedure does not require getting used to new digital workflows. Existing or familiar workflows, such as the handling of the preferred social media application, remain uninterrupted.

topics.title: Physical access to a date is the exclusive obligation of the author

subTitle: The author or originator of a date decides which group of people is granted access to the date and when a date is deleted.
Dampening the effect of the analytical methods used by the operator of a social media application.
